name: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero S.H. Figuarts Gamma 2
description: Manufacturer:BandaiCode:BTN64034-5Height:14cmCHOKING HAZARD:This product may contain small parts. It is not a toy and only suitable for the persons over 15 years old.  Attention:No guarantee on mint box.Other figures not included.Description:Set Contents:Main body, Exchangeable hand left/right x 4 types, Exchangeable head parts x 3 types, GunBonus Parts:Son Gohan head part, Son Gohan facial expression part, Son Gohan cloakGamma 2 from "Dragon Ball Super: SUPER HERO" is now available from S.H.Figuarts! Reproduce the impressive poses from the trailer, for example, by using the exchangeable parts for facial expressions, hands, etc., included as accessories! The gun by the hip is kept in the holster using the exchangeable parts. You can also enjoy the two ways the gun can be held with the exchangeable hand parts! And have even more fun reproducing scenes from the movie with the included head part with glasses on and the cloak for use with S.H.Figuarts Ultimate Gohan Super Hero (sold separately)! Combine this with Gamma 1 (sold separately) and you can line up the two characters from "Dragon Ball Super: SUPER HERO"!
